attributes.action: Replace manhole covers withe the type used in France which have better grip
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After a recent trip to France, I discovered they have manhole covers with tarmac in-fill to assist with grip to tyres, thus making them safer.
I am un-aware of the statistics for road users having accidents caused by the UK's wet manhole covers but, I am sure that they contribute towards many accidents and claims every year.
Let's make a difference.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
